alert.note: Alert for Conway; Faulkner; Perry; Southern Pope County; Yell Excluding Northwest (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 2:55PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Perry, southern Conway, central Faulkner and southeastern Pope Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 255 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Petit Jean State Park to near Morrilton to near Conway. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Conway... Morrilton... Perryville... Greenbrier... Wooster... Oppelo... Menifee... Perry... Adona... Houston... Petit Jean State Park... Sequoya Park... Hill Creek... Pickles Gap... Springhill... Toad Suck... Plumerville... Holland... Casa... Ada... This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 102 and 127. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Conway; Faulkner; Perry; Southern Pope County; Yell Excluding Northwest
